definition: half the day/a long time/quite a while
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: He made a long pause, plainly overcome by the thought that was in him.
sentences.chinese: 他顯然由於想到了什麼，半響沒有說出話來。
